title: Jezebel's Sister
description: When her sister, the local madam, and her "employees" are given a choice between jail and removing themselves from Webster, Kansas, prim and proper Cassidy Rose McAllister persuades them to join a wagon train of straitlaced churchgoers heading westward, but Cassidy soon finds herself attracted to the group's charismatic preacher. Original.
author: Emily Carmichael
